statements: UPDATE WineTastingNotes SET flavor_notes='fruity and oaky' WHERE id=1
UPDATE WineTastingNotes SET expert_name='Jane Doe', region='Napa Valley' WHERE wine_name='Merlot'
UPDATE WineTastingNotes SET flavor_notes = 'Rich fruity notes with hints of oak' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE WineTastingNotes SET expert_name = 'John Doe', region = 'Napa Valley', vintage_year = 2015 WHERE wine_name = 'Cabernet Sauvignon'
UPDATE wine_tasting_notes SET tasting_notes = 'Rich and full-bodied with hints of dark fruit' WHERE wine_name = 'Cabernet Sauvignon' AND vintage = 2018;
UPDATE common_themes SET description = 'Captures the essence of simplicity and elegance' WHERE theme_name = 'Minimalism';
UPDATE wine_tasting_notes SET region = 'California', vintage = 2015 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE common_themes SET theme_name = 'Fruit-forward', description = 'Notes of ripe fruits and berries' WHERE id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE wine_tasting_notes SET tasting_notes = 'Fruity and smooth with hints of cherry and oak' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE expert_ratings SET rating = 4.5, expert_id = 2 WHERE wine_id = 3
UPDATE wine_tasting_notes SET wine_name='Chardonnay', tasting_notes='Buttery and smooth with hints of oak' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE expert_ratings SET rating=4.5 WHERE expert_id=2 AND wine_id=5;
UPDATE wine_experts SET expertise_level='Master' WHERE name='Alice';
UPDATE wines SET region='Bordeaux', year=2015 WHERE name='Chateau Margaux';
UPDATE wine_experts SET expertise_level = 'Master' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE wines SET region = 'Napa Valley', year = 2019 WHERE name = 'Cabernet Sauvignon';
UPDATE expert_notes SET rating = 4.5, notes = 'Good balance and smooth finish' WHERE note_id = 101
UPDATE expert_preferences SET preference_score = 0.8 WHERE expert_name = 'Alice' AND theme_id = 3
UPDATE expert_notes SET expert_name = 'Jane Roe', notes = 'Very fruity and smooth' WHERE note_id = 12345;
UPDATE expert_preferences SET preference_score = 8.7, expert_name = 'John Doe' WHERE pref_id = 54321;
